about_the_game:
Incredible arts specially designed to convey the relaxing atmosphere of the game, leaving your computer's desktop with a unique look!

There are 6 images with 3840 x 2160 pixels and Ultra Wide (2560 x 1080 pixels).

* Important: After downloading this add-on will be available in the directory where the game “Hidden Memory - Nature” is installed, by default, it is (...\Steam\steamapps\common\ Hidden Memory - Nature\ Hidden_Memory_Nature-Wallpapers).

name: Hidden Memory Nature - Wallpapers
short_description: Incredible arts specially designed to convey the relaxing atmosphere of the game, leaving your computer's desktop with a unique look!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Bulgarian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*, Danish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Finnish*, Greek*, Dutch*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Swedish*, Thai*, Czech*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Arabic*
